home.subtitle: Being part of the IT world
home.title: Luciano Adamczuk

carousel.title: Introduction
items: Front-end developer focused on creating memorable web experiences.
Transforming ideas into interfaces that captivate and work well.
I stand out for being interactive, creative, and confident.

carousel.title: Philosophy
items: I believe design and user experience are key in web development.
My core principles are simplicity, usability, and refined aesthetics.
Always aiming to surprise and engage users.

carousel.title: Beyond the Code
items: I am a versatile individual who enjoys learning in various areas.
I engage in activities like reading, dancing, and sports.
My analytical mindset and curiosity drive my personal and professional growth.
